title: How to Attract Guys Without Talking to Them: 15 Classic & Reliable Tips

steps.title: Choose an outfit that makes you feel confident.
steps.content: Choose an outfit that makes you feel confident. When you feel confident, you seem more attractive to many guys. Wear clothing that fits you well and helps you look your best. This can help you attract attention without doing anything. [1] X Research source Try on all of your clothes in your closet to figure out which outfits look best on you. Then, wear these clothes for when you're hoping to get a guy to talk to you.

steps.title: Wear red to catch their attention.
steps.content: Wear red to catch their attention. The color red is an emotional trigger that can draw all eyes to you. Additionally, men typically perceive the color red as sexy. When you're hoping to attract a man's attention, pick an outfit that incorporates the color red. [2] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Wear a red dress, a red blazer, or a red top or shirt. For a pop of red, wear a scarf or tie.

steps.title: Show off your neck and shoulders for subtle sex appeal.
steps.content: Show off your neck and shoulders for subtle sex appeal . Revealing your neck and shoulders grabs their attention because your skin is bare in a nonsexual way. This makes them want to see more. Wear a low cut top, sleeveless or off-the-shoulder top, or tank top to make guys want more of you. [3] X Research source Wear an off-the-shoulder top that covers your cleavage but bares your entire shoulder and neck area. Another option is to wear a tank top that has thin straps.

steps.title: Wear a natural makeup look.
steps.content: Wear a natural makeup look . You don't need to wear makeup to get a guy's attention, so don't feel pressured to use it, especially if you don’t normally wear it. If you do enjoy makeup, use it to enhance your natural beauty and to get a guy's attention. Most guys say they like a natural makeup look, so keeping your makeup subtle may help you attract a guy. [4] X Research source Wear foundation , concealer , powder , blush , subtle eyeshadow , eyeliner on your top eyelashes, mascara on your top eyelashes, and a nude or berry lipstick .

steps.title: Choose a flattering hairstyle that makes you feel confident.
steps.content: Choose a flattering hairstyle that makes you feel confident. Styling your hair provides a frame for your face and brings your whole look together. Pick a hairstyle that flatters your face shape, works well with your hair texture, and is easy for you to keep up. Then, style your hair when you're going to be around guys you hope to attract. [5] X Research source Ask your hairstylist how to keep up your hairstyle . Look at pictures in magazines and online to get hairstyle inspiration.

steps.title: Make eye contact then look away.
steps.content: Make eye contact then look away. Shield says that eye contact is a subtle way to flirt without speaking. [6] X Expert Source Lisa Shield Dating Coach Expert Interview. 11 March 2021 When you meet his eyes, you're showing him that you noticed him. Hold his gaze for 1-3 seconds, then glance away. [7] X Research source Don't make eye contact for longer than 1-3 seconds because he might feel like you're staring. If making eye contact is hard for you, practice by staring at your own eyes in the mirror. Then, make eye contact with people you care about, like friends and relatives. It'll get easier with practice!

steps.title: Smile and laugh so he knows you’re attractive and fun.
steps.content: Smile and laugh so he knows you’re attractive and fun. Smiling brightens up your features so you look more attractive, and laughing makes you look like you're having a great time. This can make a guy more interested in getting to know you. Keep a smile on your face while you're out trying to meet guys. Find reasons to laugh, too, like the conversation you're having or something that's happening around you. [8] X Research source If you're at school, try to look like you're always having fun at lunch or between classes. For instance, tell funny stories with your friends or talk about your favorite TV shows. Practice smiling and laughing to make it easier for you to do it when you're trying to get a guy's attention.

steps.title: Play with your hair so you look flirtatious.
steps.content: Play with your hair so you look flirtatious. Shield says that twirling, mussing, or flipping your hair can draw a guy's eyes to you. [9] X Expert Source Lisa Shield Dating Coach Expert Interview. 11 March 2021 Additionally, it shows him that you're feeling flirty, which can make him feel comfortable approaching you. When you see a guy who interests you, casually flip your hair over your shoulder, twirl it around your finger, or run your fingers through it. [10] X Research source Film yourself playing with your hair so you can see what looks most attractive. You don't need to play with your hair all of the time. In fact, that might make you seem nervous. Just do it for about 5-10 seconds to subtly flirt.

steps.title: Wink at him to show him you're interested.
steps.content: Wink at him to show him you're interested. When you see a guy that interests you, signal to him that you're open to being approached by winking at him. If you're close to each other, catch his attention and wink. Otherwise, walk past him and give him a quick wink. [11] X Research source For instance, let's say you're getting a drink at a bar and see a hot guy a few seats down. Lean against the bar and give him a wink to show him you’re interested in talking. If you're in school, you might cross paths with him in the hallway and give him a wink.

steps.title: Touch your hip or arm to make him imagine touching you.
steps.content: Touch your hip or arm to make him imagine touching you. When you know a guy may be looking, subtly touch your hip, play with your necklace, or stroke your arm. This will catch a guys attention and make him imagine touching you, which can make him approach you. [12] X Research source To avoid being inappropriate, don't touch your breasts or bum. Similarly, don't rub yourself. Instead, lightly touch yourself for 2-3 seconds or run your fingers along your skin.

steps.title: Angle your body away from the friend you're talking to.
steps.content: Angle your body away from the friend you're talking to. Being out with friends can get a guy's attention because it makes you appear popular. However, it can also make it hard for guys to approach you. To show guys you're open to being approached, face your body away from your friend as you talk. [13] X Research source For example, let's say you and your friend are at a party. While you're chatting, face the room instead of each other. This way guys will feel comfortable walking up to you.

steps.title: Cross and uncross your legs every few minutes while you're sitting.
steps.content: Cross and uncross your legs every few minutes while you're sitting. Guys are often attracted to legs because they make them think of touching you sexually. Moving your legs can catch a guy's attention, so crossing and uncrossing your legs often can attract guys to you. Angle your body so that your legs are facing the room. Then, slowly cross and uncross your legs about every 2 minutes. [14] X Research source This works best if you're sitting on a high stool, but you can also do it in a regular chair.

steps.title: Brush up against him as you pass him to break the touch barrier.
steps.content: Brush up against him as you pass him to break the touch barrier. Touching is a great way to flirt with a guy, including casual touches. When you're trying to attract a guy without talking to him, “accidentally” grazing him is a great way to make contact. Walk past him and lightly brush your body against his. [15] X Research source Brush past him as you walk down the hallway at school or towards the counter at a coffee shop. As another option, choose the seat behind or next to him. Then, lightly touch him as you sit down. Since you don't want to talk to him, it's best not to bump into him too hard.

steps.title: Act a bit uninterested.
steps.content: Act a bit uninterested. When you catch him glancing at you, look away. If you guys text, wait to text him back. Playing it cool like this will help draw him to you. Whether he’s curious about what you have to offer or is eager for your attention, he will want to figure you out and get to know you. [16] X Research source Don’t act so disinterested that he thinks you don’t like him, just enough to make him want to chase you. If he’s the popular type, act like he’s not all that to make him wonder why he can’t win you over and become interested in you. Gopman says “When you are trying to flirt you're obviously interested in the person, but coming off too available is actually going to turn that other person away. So you want to make sure you leave a little bit to mystery.” [17] X Expert Source Cher Gopman Dating Coach Expert Interview. 17 May 2019.

steps.title: Act like you need help with something to trigger his protective instincts.
steps.content: Act like you need help with something to trigger his protective instincts. Many guys enjoy feeling helpful, so they're likely to offer assistance if you seem to need help. If the situation allows, create a minor problem that you need help with. Then, see if a guy will come to help. [18] X Research source For instance, let's say you're at a party. Act like you're having trouble opening your drink and ask a guy you’re crushing on to help. Similarly, you could act like you're having trouble reaching a high object. At school, you might act like you need help with an assignment. If you don't feel comfortable acting like you need help when you don't, don’t do this. Guys will be just as into you!

steps.title: Stay off your phone while you're trying to attract guys.
steps.content: Stay off your phone while you're trying to attract guys. You might want to pull out your phone so you look busy, but this can backfire. If you're looking down at your phone, it's hard for guys to approach you. Put your phone away so they know you're open to being approached. [19] X Research source It's okay to check your phone occasionally. However, don't focus all of your attention on your phone.
